AppDB.Name: IQS_CREDIT_REQUEST_PROFILE_MAP
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Mapping Queue to credit request profile

Field.Name: QUEUE_ID
Field.Description: ingress queue id (base + offset)

Field.Name: PROFILE_ID
Field.Description: credit request profile

AppDB.Name: IQS_CREDIT_REQUEST_PROFILE_GENERAL_CONFIG
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Mapping Queue to credit request profile

Field.Name: PROFILE_ID
Field.Description: credit request profile

Field.Name: IS_LOW_DELAY
Field.Description: allow to burst of packtes sent each time

Field.Name: IS_HIGH_PRIORITY
Field.Description: packets will be sent to high priority DQCQ

Field.Name: BW_LEVEL
Field.Description: High bandwidth queue, increase max dequeue commands, extra credits, queue read weight

Field.Name: IS_OCB_ONLY
Field.Description: OCB only queues

Field.Name: CREDIT_BALANCE_RESOLUTION
Field.Description: resolution of credit balance maintained by the HW

AppDB.Name: IQS_CREDIT_REQUEST_PUSH_QUEUE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Select the profile ID that will be used for push queue

Field.Name: PROFILE_ID
Field.Description: Select profile ID for push queues

Field.Name: ENABLE
Field.Description: Enable / Disable Selection

AppDB.Name: IQS_CREDIT_REQUEST_SATISFIED_THRESHOLDS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Select the profile ID that will be used for push queue

Field.Name: PROFILE_ID
Field.Description: Credit Request Profile ID

Field.Name: BACKOFF_ENTER
Field.Description: When the Credit Balance is bigger than the threshold, the device sends OFF message to the scheduler. Resolution in CBR

Field.Name: BACKOFF_EXIT
Field.Description: Hysteresis value for to the backoff enter threshold.

Field.Name: BACKLOG_ENTER
Field.Description: When the (Credit Balance - Queue Size) is bigger than this threshold the device sends OFF message to the scheduler.Resolution in CBR

Field.Name: BACKLOG_EXIT
Field.Description: Hysteresis value for to the backlog enter threshold.

Field.Name: BACKSLOW_ENTER
Field.Description: When the Credit Balance is bigger than the threshold, the device sends SLOW message to the scheduler. Resolution in CBR

Field.Name: BACKSLOW_EXIT
Field.Description: Hysteresis value for to the backslow enter threshold.

Field.Name: EMPTY_QUEUE
Field.Description: When Queue Size ==0 and Credit Balance is bigger than this threshold the device sends OFF message to the scheduler.Resolution in CBR

Field.Name: EMPTY_QUEUE_SIGN
Field.Description: Sign (negative or postive) of the threshold

Field.Name: EMPTY_QUEUE_MAX
Field.Description: The maximum credits an empty queue can accumulate. Resolution in bytes.Resolution in CBR

Field.Name: EMPTY_QUEUE_MAX_SIGN
Field.Description: Sign (negative or postive) of the threshold

Field.Name: EMPTY_QUEUE_EXCEED
Field.Description: . This indication permits the credit balance of an empty queue to exceed configured Exceed Max Empty Queue Credit Balance up to (Credit Value minus 1), when a credit is received. Resolution in CBR

AppDB.Name: IQS_CREDIT_REQUEST_HUNGRY_THRESHOLDS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Select the profile ID that will be used for push queue

Field.Name: PROFILE_ID
Field.Description: Credit Request Profile ID

Field.Name: MULT
Field.Description: N*(1 SHL HungryMult+4) up, or (N*(1 SHL HungryMult+4) - (1 SHL (HungryMult+3)) down, a new FSM is generated.0 disables this mechanism.

Field.Name: OFF_TO_SLOW
Field.Description: When (Queue Size - Credit Balance) is bigger than this threshold and the Current Status is OFF, the Status will be changed to SLOW. Resolution in CBR.

Field.Name: OFF_TO_SLOW_SIGN
Field.Description: Sign (negative or postive of the threshold

Field.Name: OFF_TO_NORM
Field.Description: When (Queue Size - Credit Balance) is bigger than this threshold and the Current Status is OFF, the Status will be changed to NORMAL. Resolution is in CBR.

Field.Name: OFF_TO_NORM_SIGN
Field.Description: Sign (negative or postive of the threshold

Field.Name: SLOW_TO_NORM
Field.Description: When (Queue Size - Credit Balance) is bigger than this threshold and the Current Status is SLOW, the Status will be changed to NORMAL. Resolution is in CBR.

Field.Name: SLOW_TO_NORM_SIGN
Field.Description: Sign (negative or postive of the threshold

Field.Name: NORM_TO_SLOW
Field.Description: When (Queue Size - Credit Balance) is smaller than this threshold and the Current Status is NOTMAL, the Status will be changed to SLOW. Resolution is in CBR.

Field.Name: NORM_TO_SLOW_SIGN
Field.Description: Sign (negative or postive of the threshold

AppDB.Name: IQS_CREDIT_REQUEST_SLOW_FACTOR_UP
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Slow factor thresholds up

Field.Name: PROFILE_ID
Field.Description: Credit Request Profile ID

Field.Name: SRC_SLOW_LEVEL
Field.Description: Source Slow level to change. From 0 to 6

Field.Name: SLOW_FACTOR_UP
Field.Description: If the queue side pass this threshold slow level is increased. 256B resolution

AppDB.Name: IQS_CREDIT_REQUEST_SLOW_FACTOR_DOWN
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Slow factor thresholds down

Field.Name: PROFILE_ID
Field.Description: Credit Request Profile ID

Field.Name: DEST_SLOW_LEVEL
Field.Description: Destination Slow level to change. From 1 to 7

Field.Name: SLOW_FACTOR_DOWN
Field.Description: If the queue side pass this threshold slow level is decreased to DST_SLOW_LEVEL. 256B resolution

AppDB.Name: IQS_CREDIT_MAX_DEQ_CMDS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: max dequeue commands allowed per bandwidth level X active queues from sram/dram to fabric

Field.Name: MAX_DEQ_CMD
Field.Description: threshold per status of active queues. 256B resolution. A value of 0 means a single packet is to be dequeued at maximum.

AppDB.Name: IQS_CREDIT_S2D_MAX_DEQ_CMDS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: max dequeue commands allowed per bandwidth level X active queues for sram to dram

Field.Name: MAX_DEQ_CMD
Field.Description: threshold per status of active queues. 256B resolution. A value of 0 means a single packet is to be dequeued at maximum.

AppDB.Name: IQS_CREDIT_DEQ_PARAMS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: max dequeue commands allowed per bandwidth level X active queues

Field.Name: CREDIT_BALANCE_MSB
Field.Description: credit balance MSB, taking into account credit balance resolution

Field.Name: SRAM_READ_WEIGHT_PROFILE
Field.Description: queue read weight profile for SRAM

Field.Name: S2D_READ_WEIGHT_PROFILE
Field.Description: queue read weight profile for SRAM to DRAM

Field.Name: DRAM_READ_WEIGHT_PROFILE
Field.Description: queue read weight profile for DRAM

Field.Name: SRAM_DEQ_EXTRA_CREDITS
Field.Description: Number of extra credits allowed in dequeue command (1KB resolution)

Field.Name: S2D_DEQ_EXTRA_CREDITS
Field.Description: Number of extra credits allowed in dequeue command (1KB resolution)

Field.Name: SRAM_DEQ_EXTRA_CREDITS_LFSR
Field.Description: Extra credit LFSR mask

Field.Name: S2D_DEQ_EXTRA_CREDITS_LFSR
Field.Description: Extra credit LFSR mask

AppDB.Name: IQS_CREDIT_REQUEST_QUEUE_READ_WEIGHT_PROFILE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: max dequeue commands allowed per bandwidth level X active queues

Field.Name: PROFILE_ID
Field.Description: Queue read weight profile

Field.Name: SQM_READ_WEIGHT
Field.Description: SQM Queue read weight

Field.Name: DQM_READ_WEIGHT
Field.Description: DQM Queue read weight

AppDB.Name: IQS_CREDIT_REQUEST_LOW_DELAY
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Set low delay values

Field.Name: DEQUEUE_BYTES
Field.Description: if IS_LOW_DELAY is set the queue may send up to DEQUEUE_BYTES on a DEQ command for queue using the stored credits. Resolution is 64B.

AppDB.Name: IQS_CREDIT_REQUEST_FMQ_TH
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Occupancy thresholds for FMQ

Field.Name: CREDIT_ON_TH
Field.Description: credit resolution, flow control on if this threholds crossed

Field.Name: CREDIT_OFF_TH
Field.Description: credit resolution, flow control off if this threholds crossed

Field.Name: BYTE_ON_TH
Field.Description: bytes resolution, flow control on if this threholds crossed

Field.Name: BYTE_OFF_TH
Field.Description: bytes resolution, flow control on if this threholds crossed

Field.Name: EIR_CREDIT_ON_TH
Field.Description: EIR credit resolution, flow control on if this threholds crossed

Field.Name: EIR_CREDIT_OFF_TH
Field.Description: EIR credit resolution, flow control off if this threholds crossed

Field.Name: EIR_BYTE_ON_TH
Field.Description: EIR bytes resolution, flow control on if this threholds crossed

Field.Name: EIR_BYTE_OFF_TH
Field.Description: EIR bytes resolution, flow control on if this threholds crossed

AppDB.Name: IQS_CREDIT_WATCHDOG_COMMON
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Set watchdog attributes common to all credit profiles

Field.Name: FIRST_QUEUE
Field.Description: Queue range to apply watchdog mechanism on.

Field.Name: LAST_QUEUE
Field.Description: Queue range to apply watchdog mechanism on.

Field.Name: FSM_SHAPER
Field.Description: Defines the period in clocks in which a token bucket is incremented.

Field.Name: MIN_CYCLE_PERIOD
Field.Description: the min number of clocks that must elapse between full scans, in clocks, is MIN_CYCLE_PERIOD * 2048.

Field.Name: CYCLES_FOR_RETRANSMIT
Field.Description: number of cycles for retransmit

Field.Name: ENABLE_EXP_MODE
Field.Description: enable mantissa-exponnet configuration for delete threshold

AppDB.Name: IQS_CREDIT_WATCHDOG_PROFILE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Set credit watchdog threhlds per profile

Field.Name: PROFILE_ID
Field.Description: Credit Request Profile ID

Field.Name: DELETE_EXP
Field.Description: Maximal elapsed WD iterations since last credit was received until moved to delete state.

Field.Name: DELETE_MANT
Field.Description: Maximal elapsed WD iterations since last credit was received until moved to delete state.

AppDB.Name: IQS_CREDIT_WORTH_CONFIG
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Basic configuratiob of Credit worth

Field.Name: ENABLE
Field.Description: Enable configuring credit worth per FAP ID

AppDB.Name: IQS_CREDIT_WORTH
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Set credit worth for each group

Field.Name: CREDIT_WORTH_GROUP_ID
Field.Description: Credit worth group

Field.Name: CREDIT_WORTH
Field.Description: Credit value of group

AppDB.Name: IQS_CREDIT_WORTH_GROUPS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Set mapping of FAP-ID to credit worth groups

Field.Name: FAP_ID
Field.Description: destination FAP-ID

Field.Name: CREDIT_WORTH_GROUP_ID
Field.Description: Credit worth group

AppDB.Name: IQS_FSM_REORDER_CONFIG
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Basic configuration of FSM reorder

Field.Name: PER_FAP_ENABLE
Field.Description: Enable configuring mode per destination FAP-ID

Field.Name: AGING_TIMER
Field.Description: Set aging threshold. Old entries are invalidated after a configurable number of Idle cycles.

AppDB.Name: IQS_FSM_REORDER_FAP_MODE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Basic configuration of FSM reorder

Field.Name: FAP_ID
Field.Description: destination FAP-ID

Field.Name: IS_SEQ
Field.Description: 1 for sequential mode, 0 for delayed

AppDB.Name: IQS_DEBUG_AUTO_CREDIT
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Set auto credit for range of queues

Field.Name: QUEUE_MIN
Field.Description: Min queue

Field.Name: QUEUE_MAX
Field.Description: Max queue

Field.Name: ENABLE_AUTO_CREDIT
Field.Description: Enable auto credit mechanism

AppDB.Name: IQS_DQCQ_FLOW_CONTROL_MASK
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Enable/disable IPS flow control to DQM/SQM (QM)

Field.Name: SRAM_TO_DRAM
Field.Description: Enable SRAM TO DRAM FC

Field.Name: SRAM_DELETE
Field.Description: Enable SRAM DELETE FC

Field.Name: DRAM_DELETE
Field.Description: Enable DRAM DELETE FC

Field.Name: OCB_ONLY
Field.Description: Enable OCB only FC

Field.Name: SRAM
Field.Description: Enable SRAM FC

Field.Name: MIXED_SRAM
Field.Description: Enable MIXED SRAM FC

Field.Name: MIXED_DRAM
Field.Description: Enable MIXED SRAM FC

AppDB.Name: IQS_VOQ_STATE_INFO
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Table to retrieve several queue state signals
